metadata.title: Deposition of Dr. Alexander Spears, State of Florida v. American Tobacco Company, Tape 2 [Parts 1-3]
metadata.description: Deposition of Dr. Alexander Spears in the case of the State of Florida v. American Tobacco Company. Spears answers questions about the independence of the Scientific Advisory Board of the Council for Tobacco Research and the extent to which attorneys were involved in scientific research activities. Click Here to View Part 1 Click Here to View Part 2 Click Here to View Part 3
